actions.name: click
actions.description: Execute a click interaction in a specific browser window.

actions.name: create-browser-window
actions.description: Opens a new window within a session, optionally navigating to a URL.

actions.name: create-session
actions.description: Starts a new browser session in Airtop.

actions.name: hover-element
actions.description: Moves mouse pointer over an element in the browser window.

actions.name: page-query
actions.description: Query a page to extract data or ask a question given the data on the page.

actions.name: paginated-extraction
actions.description: Extract content from paginated or dynamically loaded pages.

actions.name: smart-scrape
actions.description: Scrape a page and return the data as Markdown.

actions.name: take-screenshot
actions.description: Captures a screenshot of the current window.

actions.name: terminate-session
actions.description: Ends an existing browser session in Airtop.

actions.name: type
actions.description: Type into a browser window at the specified field.

actions.name: upload-file-to-session
actions.description: Push an existing file to one or more sessions, making it available for use in file inputs or downloads.
